sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01

sentences.sentence: Five days after the devastating 7.8 magnitude earthquake, a lucky few are still being pulled alive from underneath the rubble, like in Kahraman Harash on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We pulled out a man named Hussein. He was 65 years old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But these miraculous stories of survival are becoming fewer and fewer as the hours go by and a grim reality is starting to set in for those alive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More than 900,000 are in urgent need of shelter, according to the UN.

sentences.sentence: It is still unclear where this object came from, but it was approximately the size of a small car.

sentences.sentence: We do expect to be able to recover the debris since it fell not only within our territorial space, but on what we believe is frozen water.
